00044 /**************************************************************************
00045 * DEFINITIONS
00046 **************************************************************************/
00047 #define ENABLE_ALL_INTERRUPTS()     sei()                   
00048 #define DISABLE_IRQS    unsigned char _sreg = SREG; cli();  
00049 #define ENABLE_IRQS     { if(_sreg & 0x80) sei(); }         
00052 #define CONFIGURE_INT0()            {           \
00053           EICRA |= (1<<ISC01);      /* Enable Int0 falling edge */    \
00054           EICRA &= ~(1<<ISC00);     /* Enable Int0 falling edge */    \
00055           EIMSK |= (1<<INT0);       /* Enable Int0 */                 \
00056      }
00057 
00059 #define DISABLE_RX_INT()            {           \
00060           EIMSK &= ~(1<<INT0);                  \
00061      }
00062 
00064 #define ENABLE_RX_INT()             {           \
00065           EIFR |= (1<<INTF0);                   \
00066           EIMSK |= (1<<INT0);                   \
00067      }
00068 
00075 #define RELOAD_TIMER0(value, tccr0) {                                   \
00076           TCCR0B &= ~((1<<CS02) | (1<<CS01) | (1<<CS00)); /* stop timer */ \
00077           TCCR0A = 0;             /* set timer mode */                  \
00078           TCNT0  = value;         /* set start of timer, run to 0xFF */ \
00079           TIMSK0 |= (1<<TOIE0);   /* enable overflow interrupt */       \
00080           TCCR0B = tccr0;         /* clock select */                    \
00081      }
00082 
00084 #define TIMER1_OVERRUN              (TIFR1 & (1U<<OCF1A))
00085 
00087 #define CLEAR_TIMER1_OVERRUN        TIFR1 |= (1U<<OCF1A)
00088 
00090 #define RELOAD_APPLICATION_TIMER()  {                                   \
00091           TCCR1A = 0;             /* CTC (Clear Timer on Compate match) */ \
00092           TCCR1B = (1U<<WGM12)|(1U<<CS11)|(1U<<CS10); /* CTC-mode, prescale to 64 */ \
00093           OCR1A  = 16249;         /* every 130 ms OCR1A=(delay*F_CPU)/(prescaler)-1 */ \
00094           TCNT1  = 0;             /* reset timer */                     \
00095      }
00096 
00106 #define ENABLE_PWM(x)               {                                   \
00107           TCCR2A = (1<<WGM20)|(1<<COM2A1)|(1<<COM2A0);/* Phase correct PWM and enable OC2a pin */ \
00108           TCCR2B = (1<<CS20);     /* prescaler 0 */                     \
00109           TCNT2  = 0;             /* reset timer2 */                    \
00110           OCR2A  = (x);           /* defines the duty cycle */          \
00111      }
00112 
00114 #define DISABLE_PWM()               {                                   \
00115           TCCR2A &= ~((1<<COM2A1)|(1<<COM2A0)); /* disable PWM pin  */  \
00116           SETPIN_CTRL(ON);                     /* set port to high */   \
00117      }
00118 
00120 #define ENABLE_UART_TX_IRQ()        {                            \
00121           UCSR0B |= (1<<TXCIE0);       /* enable transmit IRQ */ \
00122      }
00123 
00125 #define DISABLE_UART_TX_IRQ()       {                                 \
00126           UCSR0B &= ~(1<<TXCIE0);      /* disable transmit IRQ */     \
00127      }
00128           
00130 #define UART_SEND_BYTE(tx_char)     {           \
00131           UDR0 =(uint8_t)(tx_char);             \
00132      }
00133 
00135 #define ENABLE_WATCHDOG(x)          {           \
00136           wdt_enable(x);                        \
00137      }
00138 
00139 
00141 #define DISABLE_WATCHDOG()          {           \
00142           MCUSR = 0;                            \
00143           wdt_disable();                        \
00144      }
00145 
00149 #define CONFIG_EEPROM() {                       \
00150         EECR |= (1 << EEPM1);                   \
00151         EECR &= ~(1 << EEPM0);                  \
00152     }
00153 
00155 #define ENABLE_EEPROM_READY_INT()   {           \
00156         EECR |= (1U<<EERIE);                    \
00157     }
00158     
00160 #define DISABLE_EEPROM_READY_INT()   {           \
00161         EECR &= ~(1U<<EERIE);                    \
00162     }
00163 
00164 // map interrupts
00166 #define SIG_UART_TRANS              USART_TX_vect
00167 
00168 #define EE_RDY_vect                 EE_READY_vect
